front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Test Procedures and Requirements for Alternating Current Cable Terminations Used on Shielded Cables Having Laminated Insulation Rated 2.5 kV Through 765 kV Or Extruded Insulation Rated 2.5 kV Through 500 kV (Revision of IEEE 48-1996)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
